rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads to the central courtyard and is aligned with Vastu principles for prosperity. It features a reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area adjoining the central courtyard. Designed with modern aesthetics and ample lighting in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for ease of service; designed with contemporary finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with integrated appliances and storage. Placed in a favorable direction as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located away from noisy areas; includes an ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for guests with access to the courtyard view and proper orientation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Contemporary home theater located in a quiet corner of the villa with soundproofing. The design ensures minimal interference from external noise, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open central courtyard acting as a natural light source and ventilation area. Integral to the villa's design, offering a harmonious blend of indoor and outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Primary entrance aligned with the courtyard ensuring a smooth flow of positive energy according to Vastu.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large window providing ample natural light in the living room, enhancing energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Door
openings.description: Connecting the living area to the central courtyard for seamless indoor-outdoor integration.
